type.description: Selection Type: 'single' to select a single date, 'multiple' to select multiple dates, and 'range' to select a date range
type.description_zh: 选择类型: `single` 表示选择单个日期， `multiple` 表示选择多个日期， `range` 表示选择日期区间

color.description: The accent color, which takes effect on the bottom button and the selected date
color.description_zh: 主题色，对底部按钮和选中日期生效

min-date.description: The minimum date that can be selected

max-date.description: The maximum date that can be selected

default-date.description: The date selected by default is an array when 'type' is 'multiple' or 'range', and 'null' is passed to indicate that it is not selected by default
default-date.description_zh: 默认选中的日期，`type` 为 `multiple` 或 `range` 时为数组，传入 `null` 表示默认不选择

poppable.description: Whether or not to display the calendar in the form of a pop layer
poppable.description_zh: 是否以弹层的形式展示日历

lazy-render.description: Whether to render only the contents of the viewport
lazy-render.description_zh: 是否只渲染可视区域的内容

show-mark.description: Whether to display the month background watermark
show-mark.description_zh: 是否显示月份背景水印

show-title.description: Whether or not to display the calendar title

show-subtitle.description: Whether to display the calendar subtitle (year and month)
show-subtitle.description_zh: 是否展示日历副标题（年月）

show-confirm.description: Whether or not to display a confirmation button

readonly.description: Whether it is in the read-only state, and the date cannot be selected in the read-only state
readonly.description_zh: 是否为只读状态，只读状态下不能选择日期

confirm-text.description: Confirm the text of the button

confirm-disabled-text.description: Confirm the text when the button is disabled
confirm-disabled-text.description_zh: 确认按钮处于禁用状态时的文字

first-day-of-week.description: Set the start day of the week

methods.name: reset
methods.description: Resets the selected date to the specified date, and resets it to the default date if no parameters are passed
methods.description_zh: 将选中的日期重置到指定日期，未传参时会重置到默认日期

Day.name: date
Day.description: 日期对应的 Date 对象

events.name: select
events.description: Trigger when you click and select any date
events.description_zh: 点击并选中任意日期时触发

events.name: confirm
events.description: If 'show-confirm' is 'true', it will be triggered after clicking the confirmation button
events.description_zh: 日期选择完成后触发，若 `show-confirm` 为 `true`，则点击确认按钮后触发

events.name: open
events.description: Triggered when the pop-up layer is opened

events.name: close
events.description: Triggered when the pop-up layer is turned off

events.name: opened
events.description: Opens the pop-up layer and triggers after the animation ends
events.description_zh: 打开弹出层且动画结束后触发

events.name: closed
events.description: Turns off the pop-up layer and triggers after the animation ends
events.description_zh: 关闭弹出层且动画结束后触发

events.name: unselect
events.description: When the 'type' of the calendar component is 'multiple', it is triggered when the date is unchecked
events.description_zh: 当日历组件的 `type` 为 `multiple` 时，取消选中日期时触发

events.name: month-show
events.description: Triggers when a month enters the viewport
events.description_zh: 当某个月份进入可视区域时触发

events.name: over-range
events.description: Triggered when the range selection exceeds the maximum number of days that can be selected
events.description_zh: 范围选择超过最多可选天数时触发

events.name: click-subtitle
events.description: Triggered when you click on the calendar subtitle
events.description_zh: 点击日历副标题时触发

slots.name: month-title v4.0.9
slots.description: Customize the subheadings for each month
slots.description_zh: 自定义每个月份的小标题

slots.name: confirm-text
slots.description: Customize the content of the confirmation button
slots.description_zh: 自定义确认按钮的内容

slots.name: top-info
slots.description: Customize the prompt above the date
slots.description_zh: 自定义日期上方的提示信息

slots.name: bottom-info
slots.description: Customize the prompt below the date
slots.description_zh: 自定义日期下方的提示信息
